PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 1, 1945 reads: "Hometown Boy - Joseph Lipscomb, National Negro Opera Company singer, was presented at YM and WHA, Tuesday. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of dancers for National Negro Opera Company production of "Aida," including Gertrude Harding, Ms. Allen, Marilyn Ware, Miriam Harding, Agnes Norvell, and Patsy Ware, in evening dresses standing with Joseph Lipscomb
